sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Grid, Paper, Tabs, Tab, IconButton, Chip, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Button } from '@mui/material'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, PieChart, Pie, Cell, AreaChart, Area, ComposedChart, Scatter } from 'recharts'; import { InfoOutlined, Insights as InsightsIcon, TrendingUp, WarningAmber, CheckCircle, Lightbulb, ArrowUpward, ArrowDownward } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { salesData, churnData, insights, productData, predictiveData } from '../data/analyticsData'; // Reusable Insight Card const InsightCard = ({ type, text, reason, action }) => { const getColors = () => { switch (type) { case 'critical': return { bg: '#ffebee', text: '#d32f2f', icon: }; case 'warning': return { bg: '#fff3e0', text: '#e65100', icon: }; case 'success': return { bg: '#e8f5e9', text: '#2e7d32', icon: }; default: return { bg: '#f5f5f5', text: '#616161', icon: }; } }; const colors = getColors(); return ( {colors.icon} {text} Why (Root Cause): {reason} ðŸ‘‰ Recommendation: {action} ); }; // 1. Descriptive Analytics View const DescriptiveView = () => ( ðŸ“Š Descriptive Analytics: "What happened?" Focus: Historical performance. Sales dropped 12%. Profit margin analyzed. Monthly Sales & Profit Trend Product Performance `${name} ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%`} > {productData.map((entry, index) => ( ))} Key Metrics Summary Metric Value MoM Change Status Total Sales (YTD) â‚¹45,250 +12% Average Order Value â‚¹1,240 -5%
); // 2. Diagnostic Analytics View const DiagnosticView = () => ( ðŸ” Diagnostic Analytics: "Why did it happen?" Focus: Identifying root causes. Price sensitivity correlation and churn drivers. Price vs. Sales Correlation Observation: When Price (Red Line) goes UP, Sales (Bar) tend to drop. Complaints vs. Competitor Activity Observation: Spikes in complaints correlate with competitor offers. {/* Using ReferenceAreas or specialized dots for Competitor Check could be advanced, simplified here */} ); // 3. Predictive Analytics View const PredictiveView = () => ( ðŸ”® Predictive Analytics: "What will happen next?" Focus: Forecasting future sales and churn risk using regression models. Sales Forecast (Next Quarter) Customer Churn Prediction {churnData.map((entry, index) => ( ))} {churnData.map((item) => ( {item.group} {item.value} ))} AI Prediction Based on current growth trends (CAGR 12%), we project Q1 2026 sales to exceed targets by 15%. However, churn risk in the 'At Risk' segment requires immediate intervention. ); // 4. Insights & Story View (The "Guide" in Action) const InsightsView = () => ( ðŸ’¡ Insights & Recommendations: "The Solution" Actionable intelligence derived from the data analysis. {insights.map((insight, index) => ( ))} ðŸš€ Strategic Recommendations Implement a dynamic pricing model to avoid sharp sales drops. Launch a "Win-Back" email campaign targeting the 100 'At Risk' customers. Invest in Beauty category inventory to capitalize on 60% profit margins. Storytelling Mode "In Q1, we observed a significant dip in sales driven by aggressive competitor pricing. Our diagnostic analysis confirmed that price sensitivity was the primary factor. Using our predictive model, we forecast a full recovery in Q2 if we adjust pricing by -5%." ); const AnalyticsSuite = () => { const [tabValue, setTabValue] = useState(0); const handleTabChange = (event, newValue) => { setTabValue(newValue); }; return ( } label="Descriptive" /> } label="Diagnostic" /> } label="Predictive" /> } label="Insights & Story" /> {tabValue === 0 && } {tabValue === 1 && } {tabValue === 2 && } {tabValue === 3 && } ); }; export default AnalyticsSuite;
